description: Otio is your AI research & writing partner - learn faster, work smarter
title: Otio - Your AI Research & Writing Partner
introduction: Otio is a tool designed to help researchers, students, and analysts summarize and organize their research materials, including bookmarks and videos, making it easier to gather and review key information.

faqs.question: What does Otio do?
faqs.answer: Otio helps summarize and organize research materials, including bookmarks and videos, making it easier to gather and review key information.

faqs.question: Who is Otio for?
faqs.answer: Otio is designed for researchers, students, and analysts.

faqs.question: Can Otio summarize YouTube videos?
faqs.answer: Yes, Otio can summarize YouTube videos and allow follow-up questions on the highlighted pieces.

faqs.question: Is Otio accessible from any device?
faqs.answer: Yes, Otio is accessible from any device.
